amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used by the Secretary of Veterans affairs to implement sole source contracting at the national level for the selection of devices and test strips for the self-monitoring of blood glucose.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mrs. Walorski.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
